title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files that were previously opened do not appear in the Most Recently Used (MRU) list under the File menu after restarting the workbench.
EB: The MRU list should include the files that were opened in the previous session so that users can easily access them without having to manually locate and open them again.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
